name: Magic Broom
subtitle: Dancing Duster
author: Giulia Riva

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I choose an exerted character for the Power Clean ability of Magic Broom – Dancing Duster?
A: Yes. Note that the chosen character still can’t ready at the start of their next turn.

rules_text: POWER CLEAN When you play this character, if you have a Sorcerer character in play, you may exert chosen opposing character. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.
